Banner.Description: I am a skilled and enthusiastic full stack Java developer proficient in Java and Angular.
I have a strong background in developing robust and scalable web applications.
I am an efficient collaborator passionate about creating high-quality applications.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am an enthusiastic and skilled Full Stack Java developer proficient in both Java and the Angular framework.
I have gained a solid experience in developing robust and scalable web applications using these technologies.
I am capable of effectively collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
I have a deep understanding of software development principles and best practices,and I am passionate about creating efficient and user-friendly applications.
I constantly stay updated on the latest technological advancements and I am committed to continuously improving my skills to foster innovation and achieve project goals.
I possess excellent problem-solving abilities and approach software development with meticulousness.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer <Angular,Spring Boot>
Experience.Jobs.Subject: Design and development of a tournament management platform within Capgemini.
Description: Active member of a collaborative project involving a team of 5 people.
Participation in the Formula A1 training program, including best practices such as code quality optimization, unit testing, agility, consulting skills, and Lean management.
Successfully managed team limitations and matches to ensure efficient tournament organization.
Streamlined important tournament tasks such as scheduling draws, planning matches, and sending email notifications.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer <Angular,Spring Boot>
Experience.Jobs.Subject: The implementation of a counterpart scoring platform for trading carbon credits.
Description: Development of REST APIs using Spring Boot.
Design and development of the user interface.
Integrating our application into the Keycloak server.
Creating unit tests using JUnit and Mockito.
Collaborating with the team using the Agile methodology of the Scrum framework.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer <Angular,Spring Boot>
Experience.Jobs.Subject: The creation of a web application for project management.
Description: Creating an authentication system for the users of the project management application using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
Developing user interface components for login, registration, and user profile management using Angular.
Development of REST APIs using Spring Boot.
Design and development of the user interface.
Collaborating with the team using the Scrum methodology.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: eCommerce Website
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: eCommerce Website offering easy navigation and efficient product filtering by category. Users can seamlessly add desired products to their shopping cart, customizing quantities with a few simple clicks.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: QR Code Scanner
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Code Scanner or Reader in HTML CSS & JavaScript. In this app, users can upload any QR code image and decode/extract the content from it.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Food Mine
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Designed and developed a dynamic food-centric website enriched with essential features such as a user-friendly shopping cart for hassle-free purchases. Incorporated a robust search functionality for easy navigation and quick access to desired food items. Implemented a unique rating system allowing users to express preferences by liking or disliking various types of food, enhancing the personalized browsing experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Chat Now Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application to create chat room to broadcast messages to all the users and to send an individual private message to the user.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
